definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to call out (a name etc)/to shout
to waken (to action)/to rouse (the masses)/to evoke (attention, recollection etc)
to call the wind and summon the rain (idiom); to exercise magical powers/fig. to stir up troubles
to order sb about/to use sb
to cry out/to bark out a sound
to call the wind and summon the rain (idiom)/to exercise magical powers/fig. to stir up troubles/also 呼風喚雨|呼风唤雨[hu1 feng1 huan4 yu3]
to be called/to be known as
to be called/to be referred to as
percussion instrument used by street peddlers, barbers etc to attract attention

sentences.english: Weep no more , no sigh , nor groan . Sorrow calls no time that's gone .
sentences.chinese: 栵别哭泣，别叹息，别呻吟，悲伤唤不回流逝的时光。

sentences.english: Well, do you have any questions?
sentences.chinese: 唤，你有什么其他问题吗？

sentences.english: She whistled to the dog to come back.
sentences.chinese: 她打了个呼哨把狗唤回来。

sentences.english: This time, Liu Yibin and call a few little sister with him.
sentences.chinese: 这次，刘一滨又唤来几个小妹妹陪他。

sentences.english: He calls me again fine son, just don't know if annoy to eliminate.
sentences.chinese: 他又唤我晴儿了，只是不知是否气消了。

sentences.english: I would not call thee fool, old man.
sentences.chinese: 我不会唤汝愚人，年长知者。

sentences.english: I see you riding a shotting star and hear you calling my name out side of my window.
sentences.chinese: 我看见你骑着一个流星，听见你在窗外唤着我的名字。

sentences.english: Her daughters were eagerly called to partake of her joy.
sentences.chinese: 她喜出望外，急急忙忙唤女儿们来分享她这种愉快。

sentences.english: Nale:And that includes any more, "Wizard Formerly Known As" losers, too.
sentences.chinese: 这也包括任何名字里带“曾被唤为”的废物法师。

sentences.english: Five cities in the writing, the world in lock no sleep need.
sentences.chinese: 五城中锁奇书，世间睡里无人唤。

sentences.english: She beckoned her friends closer with a wave of her hand.
sentences.chinese: 她招了招手，唤她朋友们过来。

sentences.english: He bellowed in pain when the hammer came down on his finger.
sentences.chinese: 铁锤掉下来打在手指上，他痛得嗷嗷叫唤。

sentences.english: If you need help, please push the bell—button.
sentences.chinese: 您有事情唤服务员，请按电铃。

sentences.english: It does not matter if the laughter, he rained mother-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 这一笑不要紧，他唤来了雨婆婆。

sentences.english: I know Saint Peter will call my name.
sentences.chinese: 我知道圣彼得将唤我的名。
